channel.title: [PI] Changing a bow from melee to ranging (read for more info)
channel.description:
Hey, I have recently added the Zaryte bow and I am changing it to fire the crystal bow arrows (glowing green, (need help with that if you have time) but then i equip the the bow, it comes up with the same attack styles as melee. How do I change it into bow? :S thanks in advance and here is the picture of what I mean!
Normal look http://prntscr.com/6opxo
Zaryte bow http://prntscr.com/6opym

item.title: [PI] Changing a bow from melee to ranging (read for more info)
item.dc:creator: @RegalX RegalX
item.description:
@RegalX wrote:

No worries

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Changing a bow from melee to ranging (read for more info)
item.dc:creator: @iamlies iamlies
item.description:
@iamlies wrote:

[quote=“RegalX, post:4, topic:435026”]Go to itemassistant.java and search for

under this are lots of different weapon prefixes. These prefixes define whether the item has certain attack styles like chop lunge rapid etc. Look for your section of code which has

replace the whole statement that this affects and replace it with this

} else if (WeaponName.endsWith("bow") || WeaponName.endsWith("10")|| WeaponName.endsWith("full") || WeaponName.startsWith("seercull") || WeaponName.contains("Zaryte Bow") { c.setSidebarInterface(0, 1764); //accurate, rapid, longrange c.getPA().sendFrame246(1765, 200, Weapon); c.getPA().sendFrame126(WeaponName, 1767);

Hope this helps.[/quote]

You sir, are a genius! I tried this before but got the one “} else” thing. Rep++ to you! Thanks a lot!

Read full topic

@RegalX wrote:

Go to itemassistant.java and search for

under this are lots of different weapon prefixes. These prefixes define whether the item has certain attack styles like chop lunge rapid etc. Look for your section of code which has

replace the whole statement that this affects and replace it with this

} else if (WeaponName.endsWith("bow") || WeaponName.endsWith("10")|| WeaponName.endsWith("full") || WeaponName.startsWith("seercull") || WeaponName.contains("Zaryte Bow") { c.setSidebarInterface(0, 1764); //accurate, rapid, longrange c.getPA().sendFrame246(1765, 200, Weapon); c.getPA().sendFrame126(WeaponName, 1767);

Hope this helps.

item.title: [PI] Changing a bow from melee to ranging (read for more info)
item.dc:creator: @iamlies iamlies
item.description:
@iamlies wrote:

At the moment I don’t mid that it doesnt shoot anything. The point is, it is classed as a melee weapon but it should have the same interface as all other bows. I also have this problem for the gravite bow but I don’t care about that
